name: Traditional Doom Metal
description: Monotonous and heavy playing style; repetitive, rough, and sometimes atonal guitar riffs; a "rocking to sleep" bass; and influences from both Blues Rock and Psychedelic Rock.

children.name: Epic Doom Metal
children.description: Emphasizes Heavy Metal influence and theatrical vocals.
